notes: Classic Saab 900 (1980-1993). Convertible introduced 1986. Turbo SPG performance variant. Front-wheel drive with longitudinal engine. Quirky Swedish engineering, ignition key between seats. Timing chain engines. Data sourced from Wikipedia Saab 900 article, January 2025 revision.

First-generation Saab 9000 (1985-1998). Type Four platform shared with Fiat Croma, Lancia Thema, Alfa Romeo 164. Turbo engines standard. Front-wheel drive executive car. Timing chain engines. Data sourced from Wikipedia Saab 9000 article, January 2025 revision.
